```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(igraph)
library(tidygraph)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r Netzwerk einlesen}

# edgelist
el <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nilsmwtz/SNA-Billionaires/refs/heads/main/edgelist.csv", header=T, as.is=T, sep = ",")

# nodelist
nl <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nilsmwtz/SNA-Billionaires/refs/heads/main/nodelist.csv", header=T, as.is=T, sep = ",")

# erstellt das Netzwerk als tidygraph-Objekt

bil <- tbl_graph(nodes = nl, edges = el, directed = FALSE)

bil
```

```{r Netzwerk "Billionaires" Visualisieren fig.height=9, fig.width=16}

plot(bil,
  asp = 0,
  layout = layout_with_fr,
  vertex.color="lavender",
  vertex.size=degree(bil)*1.25,
  edge.arrow.size=.2,
  edge.arrow.color="black",
  main="SNA Netzwerk Billionaires"
  )
```

```{r Filtern nach Erbe}
bil_ms <- bil %>% 
  activate(nodes) %>% 
  filter(money_source == 1)
bil_ms


```
